full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 TERNITY EVALUATION REPORT 7017 ALBERT PICK ROAD GREENSBORO, NC 27409-9525 GENETIC DESIGN Race Blood Drawn Mother ISMANIE JONASSAINT Black April 29, 1994 Child LUCIEN JONASSAINT April 29, 1994 Alleged Father NOT TESTED Black Case Number: A72851592 Reference No.: 0030680801/94229523 Location: MIAMI, FL Account: BC800D MATERNITY SYSTEM MOTHER CHILD ALLEGED FATHER INDEX DNA: D17S26 2.80 3.10 ? EFD52/HAEIII 1.99 1.99 ? 3.90 D4S139 4.10 10.69 ? H30/HAEIII 6.81 6.81 ? 2.28 D10S28 1.41 6.21 ? TBQ7/HAEIII 1.41 1.41 ? 3.38 D2S44 2.34 2.34 ? YNH24/HAEIII 1.72 1.14 ? 3.38 D7S467 3.80 3.05 ? AC415/HAEIII 2.25 2.25 ? 5.73 D1S339 1.27 3.32 ? AC425/HAEIII 3.18 3.18 ? 3.13 PROBABILITY OF MATERNITY 99.95% LIKELIHOOD RATIO 1822 to 1 CONCLUSIONS: The alleged mother, ISMANIE JONASSAINT, cannot be excluded as the biological mother of LUCIEN JONASSAINT. Based on the above genetic testing results, the probability of maternity is 99.95% as compared to an untested random woman of the North American Black population. (Prior Probability = .5) 99.99% of falsely accused women would be excluded as the mother by the above tests. I, the undersigned Director, upon being duly sworn on oath, do depose and state that I read the foregoing report on the analysis of genetic specimens from the above-named individuals, signed by myself, and that the facts and results therein are true and correct. Sworn to and Subscribed before me this PARAD R. Scott Foster, Ph.D., Director 16th day of (June 1994 Berta Hamby Huggins, Ph.D., Director at Greensboro, North Carolina. Robert A.
